sentences.sContent: But though my instinctive nature is to run from bossy tea party attendees, I have realized over the years that I do need women as friends.
sentences.sContent_eng: But though my instinctive nature is to run from bossy tea party attendees, I have realized over the years that I do need women as friends.
sentences.sCn: 虽然我本能地要远离茶话会里专横跋扈的那些女人，但是在过去的日子里我也意识到我确实需要女性朋友。

sentences.sContent: How will the tea party convention advance or hurt the movement?
sentences.sContent_eng: How will the tea party convention advance or hurt the movement?
sentences.sCn: 茶党大会将怎样推进或伤害这次运动？

trans.tranOther: a small party in the afternoon at which tea, cake etc is served
